Message:
After that, a year passed,
and I had nothing left
to teach Illya.

The power hidden within her
has also remained stable.
Right now, she’s the perfect
image of a “child of God.”

The number of ways people
react to such great power are
as limited as the flip of a coin.

The fact that her parents didn’t
forget their love for their daughter
is yet another miracle.

“From here, you’ll have
to go forward alone.

Do your best out there!
I’ll be cheering you on
from the bottom of my heart,
hoping your journey turns out
as wonderfully as your very soul!”
